alert.note: Alert for Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Eastern Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 1:07AM EST until December 01 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Maryland, Central and Eastern Allegany County. In Virginia, Eastern Highland County. In West Virginia, Eastern Grant, Eastern Mineral and Eastern Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. A few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Eastern Pendleton
